website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight steel-frame cot unfolds quickly and easily at bedtime. However, there is not a way to lock the frame open.
pros: Canvas sleep surface supports up to 75 lbs
Includes fitted sheet and easy-fit travel case
cons: Does not have a locking mechanism
Sleep surface is not the most supportive
Consider putting a crib mattress on top of it for sleeping

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE PRODUCT- REGALO WOULD NOT REFUND OR REPLACE-
customer_reviews.text: Really Really disappointed by Regalo... We were big supporters of their products but their customer service is horrendous. This cot broke after 1 week of use in a 1 year period. The bold holding the cot together collapsed underneath my 3 year old child. My son is a small 33 pound child, who slept on the cot no more than 5 days in a one year period. The product was defective, and regalo would not replace or refund the product. Really poor customer service here... won't be purchasing from them again!
customer_reviews.author: leah j

customer_reviews.title: It was very comfortable and just great
customer_reviews.text: I bought a blue Regalo cot at Walmart 2 years ago. It was very comfortable and just great!!! It finally wore out and broke after my daughter used it every weekend for 2 years. Not a big deal, I decided to order a new one from amazon but this time in pink. It'seems awful. The middle part is highly then the rest of the cot. Not only is it very uncomfortable but I would think it would mess up my daughter'so back eventually, and I am definitely not going to let it happen. Returning it right away and seeing if I can find a blue at Walmart again. If not, they I will be looking for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Well made and seems to sleep well.
customer_reviews.text: Thinking about getting a second one. My grandson loves it. He is 4yrs old and weighs 40 pounds. He even lays around on it when he is watching shows on his ipad. He says it's comfortable and he has some room to grow. I bought him a sleeping bag too, but he just laid on top of that too and wanted a blanket. It must be rather comfy, I'm also having a hard time keeping my lab off of it. which is why I intend to buy a second one Thankfully it came with an easily removable and easily washable sheet. Seems to be made to last. So far I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Keto Diamond

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TODDLER COT for families on the go.
customer_reviews.text: These Regalo toddler cots are the best! My grandchildren love them. They can be used from the time the child is out of a port-a-crib (for travel, visiting) until ??? One of the grandsons is now 5 and still using his. They fold up very easily into a bag sort of like a camp chair. My daughter has brought these for the kids to sleep in when they are staying in motels, camping, visiting relatives and friends overnight. We got a water proof pad and toddler bed sheets, which are very nice because the bottom sheet has elastic all around, and the top sheet is "fitted" on the bottom, so the sheets stay on the cot.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Gran

customer_reviews.title: Coolest Product I've Bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest product I've purchased in a while. It's absolutely the perfect solution for my 3 year old who just got too big for a pack n play. We bought it to use in our camper (for which it was perfect) but then ended up using it at the beach, in our tent, on our boat, etc. Our son is so comfortable on this, and it's super portable.
customer_reviews.author: jf

customer_reviews.title: does not LOCK into place as the directions say it will do
customer_reviews.text: very easy set up. my only gripe is that it states in the pamphlet that "The bed will not fully lock into place until use, when there is weight on the surface". the bed does not LOCK into place even when there is weight on it. i think that feature would warrant a 5 star rating. if used on a wood floor it does start to fold up on it's own when there is no weight on it.
customer_reviews.author: arcata

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and comfy for the littlest one.
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable sleeping option for your littlest one. I’m using it to transition my 1YO out of my bed. My little 5YO fits in this perfectly. It unfolds easily right out of the box. The sleeping bag hugs on the cot and covers it perfectly. It’s a silky sleeping bag that is cool to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Joellyn Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: all my pets like using it
customer_reviews.text: I got this to be an elevated dog bed, all my pets like using it. My kitten has become especially creative in playing on it, he gets under the sheet to ‘hide’ and then will strike anything that moves by..
customer_reviews.author: Becker

customer_reviews.title: Beware - quality has changed??
customer_reviews.text: I bought one a couple years ago and it was fine, however I just received another one yesterday and it's horrible. It bows up high in the center and sags on the sides. I've tried to see if it's put together wrong, but it looks in every other way like the first one. Not at all comfortable. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for my dog for camping, took her a minute but she ended up loving it .
customer_reviews.author: Jill A. Wurm

customer_reviews.title: I bought this a month ago or so for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a month ago or so for my dogs and it works really well. They're 100 lbs and 80 lbs and have yet to break it or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for toddler!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this toddler cot! My son is 3 and fits on it perfectly. He had recently started to outgrow his pack-n-play when traveling and this was a perfect transition bed for travel until he needs a blowup mattress. I purchased a twin sized foam mattress topper from Wal-mart for $9.94 for added cushion (cut down to size) and covered with the cover that came with the toddler cot, followed by a crib sheet. I will definitely be purchasing an additional one in the future!!
customer_reviews.author: V-Ron

customer_reviews.title: Toddler-son-approved.
customer_reviews.text: My two-year old transitioned from a crib to a toddler bed so the Pack-N-Play was a no-go for traveling. This cot solves that problem. It's easy and sturdy. The integrated sleeping bag makes him less likely to fall out, though that doesn't seem to be an issue with this design anyway. For cold nights, we found it helpful to put a couple layers of blanket under the sleeping bag. In warmer weather, that's not necessary. My son loves it so much he uses it occasionally in his bedroom. We ended up purchasing two more for frequent sleep-away locations. The price made that a reasonable strategy.
customer_reviews.author: Peter K Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware. Weak legs.
customer_reviews.text: This product was great, until the leg snapped in half after just a few months of periodic use. Really a shame. My daughter loved using it when we were on trips. The leg didn't just bend, it snapped. My daughter never used it inappropriately (as a trampoline) or anything else. My daughter is only 3 years old, and is tiny; nowhere near the weight limit.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Roush

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought three of these for our youngest kids. We thought they would be good for hotel stays, traveling, camping, sleepovers and to keep handy in our master bedroom for when our little bed hogs make there way in our room in the middle of the night. The kids love them! They seem well made and durable and I appreciate the spare sheet and carry bag. They obviously have no padding, but the kids don’t seem to mind. We use preschool nap mats on them and they fit well. My only recommendation to the manufacturer would be making them with an aluminum frame so they would be lighter weight.
customer_reviews.author: KG621

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: I definitely wouldn't recommend this cot for anyone to put their toddler in. The middle of the cot is higher than the other ends, which means its not only super uncomfortable to lay on, but its really bad for a kid's spinal alignment. I attempted to rectify the problem by putting a thick memory foam pad on top, but the frame is just so poorly designed, that nothing will fix this problem. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: TheAmazingMrsA

customer_reviews.title: BEST TRAVEL BED EVER!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best travel beds ever! I have one for each kid (ages 4 and 6) and they are so simple to set up that they can both do it themselves. They literally work just like the foldable camp chairs. Effortless to put away after use​, and the included sheet is a great addition! I actually keep the sheet on it and store it with it on until it needs to be washed. Not only are they easy to use, my kids LOVE them! These let the hubby and I still get a king size bed when traveling and then the kids can just use these. So glad I came across these.
customer_reviews.author: GoodBooks55

customer_reviews.title: Overall, its sturdy! BUT....
customer_reviews.text: Overall, its sturdy! My 4 year old nephew is using it for his 1 week vacation. In fact, It is last night the 1st time he use it. I added soft blanket to make it softer. It fits him, but he moves/sleeps all over and so his feet comes/hanging out :). My nephew says its soft and comfy. However, it would be better if there is carrying case/bag to travel. Items is just box up and you could toss away, after. Can I buy carrying case that fit this? Also, no Lock mechanism so it folds/bend if you move...anyhow, its not a big deal at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea but needs some improvement
customer_reviews.text: The sleeping bag is torn again! Our grandson loves his cot and readily takes naps when he visits us, but he has only slept on this cot 10-15 times in the two years we've owned it and this is the second sleeping bag that's torn. He doesn't jump on cot or do anything to tear it. The company nicely replaced the first bag, but it hasn't been 6 months and it's torn again. I think we'll look for a children's sleeping bag to lay on the cot in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: small would not suggest for more than naps
customer_reviews.text: Initially I purchased this for my 3 year old grandson as he outgrew the pack and play we used when he stayed overnight. I thought this was a good alternative than buying a toddler bed, but this looks uncomfortable and really has no roll protection for a little flipper. We used it for the younger grand child she's one for a nap, but folded a blanket on top for cushion. She slept pretty well on it, but not sure it's worth keeping.
customer_reviews.author: N. Haydel

customer_reviews.title: easy to fold and unfold and easy to move around ...
customer_reviews.text: The cot is kind of weird. It raises up in the middle which makes it a bit uncomfortable for the littles when they lay down. I think you would probably need a foam topper or something which totally defeats the purpose of trying to have something handy for naps in the office if I bring her to work or to travel with. Other wise its cute, easy to fold and unfold and easy to move around with as it is very light but still feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: KAY

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I thought I could use it on my back porch for my dog to lay on so she wasn’t lying on the hard deck. Only problem is that the way it’s set up the support in the middle makes it hard for her to lay on as it sticks up & makes it’s uncomfirtable to a point she won’t use it. I’m going to attempt to use a 4” memory foam cut to size & make a cover for it out of an old sheet so maybe it will make the cot more comfortable for her. I can’t possibly see this being used for a child to lay on.
customer_reviews.author: karen denner

customer_reviews.title: Clean, easy to set up, works for nap time at my house
customer_reviews.text: 4y/o had outgrown the pack and play, needed a quick solution. This works fine except I think a lever to keep it locked open would be a good idea. It's a very thin, lightweight cot. I added a foam mattress pad and extra sheet to make it more comfy. Rated up to 75lbs. So far, so good. Little Dude is napping fine when he comes to visit! :)
customer_reviews.author: SusanKnows

customer_reviews.title: Worth ever penny!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! My husband got these for a camping trip and we have taken them on the last three trips we’ve taken! We have a 3 year old and a 18month old, who are terrible to sleep with! Like 2 drunk octopi completeling everything but a cavity search while hunting for their car keys! We’re talking nose crushing, jewel smashing, stomach kicking.. okay i’ll sleep on the floor terrors! We pack a blanket pillow or a sleeping bag and the cots and everyone has their own bed! It’s Amazing and has helped our vacations because everyone actually sleeps! That means less tantrums, and short parenting tempers... priceless! I wish we had these years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item for quickly deploying a temporary bed for your toddler
customer_reviews.text: This small fold-able bed is perfect for having a bed whenever you need one. It is low to the ground. It unfolds just like a beach chair. One hand operation, and it comes with a cover for top of bed and a storage cover for the bed when folded. I went and purchased for $12 a 1" foam mattress topper that I cut to fit the bed. With the additional foam and fitted cover sheet (included) it's quite comfortable. My grandson, 21 months, immediately knew this was his bed and took to it like a fish to water!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kurtzer

customer_reviews.title: It will work.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was quick and no issues with the sellers. The product is just basically like a folding chair and the sleeping bag stretches over the cot. I was hoping there was a way to lock the legs to maintain tension on the cot but it's just like a standard chair. Haven't had my kid on it yet, I just got it for an upcoming hotel stay, but will probably bring a few extra blankets. Overall it seems like a good product, but it could use some locks on the legs and maybe a handle on the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. I bought it for my son for when he stays the weekend at my sister's house, because he was outgrowing the play pen. He fits in it perfectly, and hasn't rolled out of it yet. 2 things I didn't like about it was that there is a slight hump in the middle when he sleeps, but that was a pretty easy fix, since I have a kids' travel mattress. There is no bar in the middle of the cot for anyone wondering. 2nd thing is that I wish there was some kind of step or carrier bag for storage when folded. Other than those things, I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kenisha Dent

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to travel with
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these cots for three months now. We have traveled to seven different states and used them in hotels and relative's homes. We used them for weeks straight in our home because our furniture did not arrive from our move. It is easy to travel with, can be stored in a closet until ready for use, and required no assembly. we even used this for tail gating when the kids needed naps at a game. We love it and will purchase more as needed. They are very durable and strong.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Iny

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded from the pack n play to use this for traveling and not having to share a bed with him. It is so cute and feels like a good quality. The sleeping bag portion can be taken off and on and attaches like a fitted sheet to the cot. My son immediately climb in and zipped himself in and been laying in it for the last hour very pleased with himself. However I think we will only get a year or two out of this as it is only 4 ft long. My 3 year old fits very nicely now but it wouldn't be good for kids past 4/5 depending on height
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cot (1/6/2018) for my then 5 year old to use for quiet time at my office while homeschooling. Figured it would be perfect as she is well under the weight and it folds up to put away. She is now 6 and just 50lbs and at least 3 of the bolts has snapped. She has used this maybe 125 times. She is tall, however she always curls up and never sleeps completely straight. Would not recommend for extended daily use. Will be purchasing a more traditional school cot to replace this.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Dawn Amidon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Perfect for kids!
customer_reviews.text: We travel a lot so I ordered this for my 4-year-old and it's exactly what we needed. It's comfortable to her, perfect height so she's off the ground, but not too high in case she rolled off, and very easy to set up and put away. It comes with a sheet and carrying bag making it perfect for travel. Sometimes she even likes to pull it out when she watches TV in the living room and she can actually set it up and take it down herself.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This item was returned due to lack of quality. We had a blue one that lasted for several years with no issues. I bought this pink one expecting the same quality. I pulled it out to use a second time and it unfolded all the way to the floor. This had never happened with our blue one. I refolded it up and back out again. Again it went to the floor. My daughter tried it and found it was not comfortable this way. I requested a return and refund. The process of quick and easy. I was disappointed with the quality and did not try another.
customer_reviews.author: Tamar

customer_reviews.title: Good travel option for a toddler.
customer_reviews.text: This cot has worked perfectly for our large 2.5yo. He sleeps comfortably all night and during naps while we are traveling. To make this cot work, however, you need blankets to make the cot level, otherwise the cot is raised in the middle and probably not at all comfortable even for a small kid. The cot came with a travel bag but it ripped right away. So that was a bit of a bummer. Overall, it's such a good travel sleep option that I think the positives for us outweigh the negatives.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Miller

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy set up! Convienent for trips!
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice to take on trips. I use this in the hotel because my little one tends to fall off the bed! I also send this with her when she stays the night with family. It folds up really nicely and has a cute little bag it fits in. It’s low to the ground which is perfect. I like how easily and quickly you can put out and take it down. However, the reason for only 3 stars is the comfort. It has bars to hold it up and you can feel these in the middle spots of the bed. I fixed the problem though-I just put a couple of layers of blankets and we’re good! Lol
customer_reviews.author: abojo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sleep over bed for the kidlets
customer_reviews.text: I got this for when my 3yr old niece comes to stay over. We can't share a bed anymore, we both move around to much. She absolutly loves this "special" bed just for her. She likes that it's just her size and that she can get in and out of it easily and that she can reach the things she might need at night, like her water cup on the floor. Folds up small and is easy to pack away. I did fold up a bulky blanket on top of it to make it more cushy for her, but it probably wasn't needed.
customer_reviews.author: Super Shiney Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The package came within a day on prime but the quality of the product is not that great. I would like for my child to be comfortable while camping and this cot is not much so. It dosen't lock into place and it pulls tight in the center so when my child lays on it her mid back is being held up while her legs and upper back/neck slough down, imagine it like laying on a pole. Not cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Russell H.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy for what it is, just didn’t work ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy for what it is, just didn’t work for us, we got it so she’d sleep on it through the night instead of our bed, but she still wouldn’t. She did say it was uncomfortable after sleeping on it more than 3-4 hours, I tried it out, it was very comfy, I was pleasantly surprised, given the price
customer_reviews.author: Greg S.

customer_reviews.title: Too small for a small 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: This item does not meet product description. there is no way a 2-5 year old fits on this and I was thrown off by people saying their 5-7 year old slept on it! my son is 3 and in the 23% for height. With his head on a pillow his feet were off the bottom edge. the toddler sleeping bag I got for him to use with it was a full foot longer. There might be some exceptions but don't be fooled by comments like I was. The average preschooler could not sleep on this. Mine chose the floor over the cot.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan M Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great, just doesn’t actually come with a sheet
customer_reviews.text: Cot is working out great for my 2 year old who recently transitioned to a big girl bed. We dreaded travel after that but she was so excited about her little bed, she did great! Our only complaint is that the “sheet” is not a sheet at all, just a cover that is the same material as the cot. Would’ve preferred to have a bag to carry it in rather than that. A crib sheet fits over it pretty well though!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Got this for vacation after reading the reviews. Perfect for my 2.5 year old. The bed sits about a foot off the ground which is fine so he won’t get hurt if he rolls off. It’s comfy enough for him and portable. Folds up to be about the side of a pack and play and very lightweight. The price also is great. Easy to set up, just folds right up no need to assemble anything. Also comes with a fitted sheet. If needed, a crib sheet would also fit. I considered getting an inflatable mattress but they cost more and could possibly pop so I decided on this. Much better choice in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: No more co-sleeping when traveling. Worth. It.
customer_reviews.text: We throw a soft blanket on it and let her sleep in it when we stay with family while traveling, sometimes for naps when we are away from home and send it with her when she stays overnight with her Grandparents. She loves it. It isn’t the most comfortable, but once you add a blanket, it really is fine. She doesn’t seem to mind at all and looks forward to using it. Our daughter is a restless sleeper but it’s low to the ground so she’s yet to tip it or fall out of it (which surprised me). I’d recommend it for small children for camping or traveling where beds may be limited.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected, would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these (one for each of my kids) to use for nap time and to take to grandparents’ house for sleepovers. Very sturdy, easy to set up and fold back up (my 3 year old can do it by himself). Good size. Only issue I had was one of the sheets it comes with wasn’t sewn correctly and didn’t fit around the cot. I hadn’t contacted the company or amazon because I didn’t plan on using them...although the material of the sheet is nice and the cot material is not soft.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great for napping
customer_reviews.text: We are using this for my son during nap time when he is away from home. He transitioned easily from his pack and play to this cot. We have it placed against a wall on one side to help ensure he doesn’t fall out. (He can be a wild sleeper) It seems to be good quality and comfortable for him to rest in. There is a slight high spot in the middle, but that seems to have relaxed after some use. Very easy to unfold and came with a nice washable sheet to use. I could see using this in the future for other things.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Good initially...
customer_reviews.text: The cot "sheet" is so cheaply sewed that it fell apart after one wash. After I fixed that, I realized the sheet also shrank so much that it pulled the corners of the cot up, thus collapsing it a little bit. Not much, but enough to prevent us from using again. I think we can still use the cot but only with a mattress pad that will help it stay flat. The cot could really benefit from a locking mechanism that prevents self collapsing.
customer_reviews.author: WeBeBoppin

customer_reviews.title: The best money I’ve ever spent.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bed. She’s a primadonna and refuses to lie in the dirt. If we take for camping or outdoors she will pace and whine but will not lay down. This folding cot is a godsend and makes her happy. It’s small enough to carry so if we take her in public we can take this along. I bring it to an outdoor restaurant we regularly go to and she gets alot of attention! I should earn a commission because I have shared the link to purchase with strangers and friends alike.
customer_reviews.author: Guidomom

customer_reviews.title: No longer comes with storage case
customer_reviews.text: I like this cot for traveling with our kids. This is our second one. Seems to be quality. When I received it and opened the box the case (that the Amazon and Regalo box) say is included wasn't in there. I called Regalo customer service and was told that the cases are no longer included and that there are none available. That Amazon hadn't updated their info yet. As you can see the bag is advertised on their box. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Heffernan

customer_reviews.title: I mean she hates that she is not allowed on the bed anymore but it's definetly her second favorite place to be
customer_reviews.text: So full disclosure. I use this bed for my dog. She loves it! I mean she hates that she is not allowed on the bed anymore but it's definetly her second favorite place to be. I should also mention that I added some foam to create more of a bed feel. The cover didn't fit too well over it but I ended up just pinning it so the cover would stay on. Overall, it's a great order.
customer_reviews.author: yasmin

customer_reviews.title: I was almost worried
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived we were worried, the boxes it came in were pretty banged up - and the one box had been OPENED and folded shut. We’re a super super busy family and my younger two often end up staying at grandmas while I work overnights so this seemed perfect. My daughter thinks it’s the greatest thing ever. She says it’s comfortable and even took a nap in it ASAP. The only disappointing part is - the cover sheet that’s included was ripped. We aren’t going to request a replacement as we have unused crib sheets from my older daughter we’re going to use.
customer_reviews.author: Akela dix

customer_reviews.title: Great Mobility!
customer_reviews.text: My son's friends love sleeping on these cots.. The mobility of the cots allow the kids to sleep anywhere which is great for Lil ones that wake up with night terrors and expect you to bring them home at 3am.. Instead you can bring the cot next you mum's bed and she can hold their hand till they fall asleep again..
customer_reviews.author: Sinbar

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and good for naps but maybe not long night sleep
customer_reviews.text: A good thing to have at grandmas for occasional nap time. Easy to open up and unfold, but hard to put back in the box. The box said there’s a “convenient carrying case for on the go” but that was not included in our box. Missing? If there is a case then yes it would also be good for traveling. Reminds me of those folding camp chairs. For now it’ll just stay at grandma’s since it’s hard to move around without straps to hold it secure or without the carrying case it advertised on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Lillymama

customer_reviews.title: Love this little cot!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our four year old for when we travel. We have three kids and we can’t fit them all in a double queen room any longer. He loves his cot and actually sleeps in it a lot at home too. We lay his sleeping bag on top (for extra comfort) and then cover him with a blanket. He will likely outgrow it in a year or so, but still worth every cent. After he outgrows it, we still plan to use it for travel for lounging and at our campsites.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Massengill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This is the second 1 I have ordered. Having toddlers, sometimes they just feel like sleeping wherever they lay down at. It is comfortable, reliable, and easy to transport around the house and even to my moms when they go there to visit. Even when I need an extra chair for them, it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: 302Style

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my Bulldog
customer_reviews.text: Out of box and ready to use. I purchased this for my English Bulldog. As soon as I opened it up he was on it. He loves it. Perfect size for him. I'm happy he is off my couch now lol. Love that it has the sheet. Easy to keep clean of dog hair. Would buy again. The grey it a beautiful color
customer_reviews.author: Loveagoodbuy

customer_reviews.title: Happy we purchased it...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cot for our almost 3-year-old for camping in a tent. Even though our son slept well on it, it seems a little uncomfortable to me with a bar in the middle. However, it's sturdy - - probably because of that bar. Maybe just add a folded blanket on the bottom for extra cushion. No disappointed that we purchased it, but just doesn't seem that comfortable. Good quality and folds up easily with a nice carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin V.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my 6 year old for when we are traveling. She doesn’t need to sleep on the floor & it’s way better than a air mattress as you don’t have to worry about blowing it up or it getting deflated. It folds & unfolds very easily & can be used as a bed for one (perfect for sleepovers too), chair at a soccer game or a chair at the beach for 2 kids. Multi use, folds up small like a camping chair & it’s perfect to bring anywhere. Also comes with a bag for easy storage too. So glad I found this. I’m excited to have it for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great little cot for your little one
customer_reviews.text: I brought this with me to a hotel for my child to sleep on. She is almost 6, so she exceeds the suggested age range for use, but she seemed pretty comfortable while she was using it. It folds up like a camping chair and comes with a bag.
customer_reviews.author: MMerk1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Was trying to find something to graduate my grandson to now that he doesn't fit the pack n play. This works great. Perfect size for him, he's 4 1/2. It's low enough to the ground that I don't have to worry about him getting hurt if he rolls off of it, but he feels like a big boy having his own special set up at gramma's house. It packs up into this neat carrying bad and barely takes up any space when not in use. Would even be great for camping or traveling to hotels or such.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Wright

customer_reviews.title: toddler loves it
customer_reviews.text: This came yesterday. I got it because my grandson is just NOT a good bed buddy. Wiggle wiggle wiggle, but I didn't want to stop him from sharing my room while his little brother was put to bed. He is thrilled with it. He is a tall 4 year old, but he fits. It has a little cover that can be removed and washed, so I allowed popcorn while he watched a movie ( something forbidden in my bed) so the excitement just grows!
customer_reviews.author: boewid

customer_reviews.title: Best money spent!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cot for our summer vacation knowing there wouldn't be enough beds. Our 3yr old is obsessed. After vacation, he still loves to sleep on his cot- some nights he prefers it over his own bed. It's perfect for sleepovers at his grandparents houses or when he has sleepovers here. Crib sheet fits perfectly. The cot is very sturdy and well made! We love how it easily and effortlessly folds up too. Best money spent.
customer_reviews.author: JamieL

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well to two grandkids and 3 years of occaisional service
customer_reviews.text: Great portable cot / bed for visiting 3-6 year old kids...has lasted through numerous sleep-overs of 3 visiting grandkids and two car campiing trips! We now have 3 of these in a storage closet. They do not, however, serve well as a trampolines or containers for spilled drinks...use a washable liner for tent camping use! Weatherbug
customer_reviews.author: Weatherbug

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love these but the sizing was way off
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love these but the sizing was way off. We purchased two for our two boys, 4 and 2 and their feet reached the end. They were portable and well made but would not have lasted past a month or two because of their height and we don't have abnormally tall-for-their-age children.
customer_reviews.author: PhuongChi T Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for my toddler to sleep on when we travel. It is great quality, and my toddler loves it! It folds up and goes in a bag anoutbthe size of a camping chair - much smaller than a pack and play. I like that it comes with a sheet, so I don’t have to worry about finding one that fits.
customer_reviews.author: MomToTwo

customer_reviews.title: Portable and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I love how lightweight and portable this cot is! I’m getting one for grandma’s house and one for the nanny’s house. Thinking about getting another for camping too since they’re so inexpensive. The only thing I don’t like about it is there isn’t a way to lock it in the open position. The first thing my toddler did is try to climb underneath it and the legs tried to pivot/collapse and it pinched her throat. Scary! But she hasn’t tried to do that since. Maybe a well placed carabiner or ratchet strap would work. Still way cheaper than a playpen!
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean and perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: this cot saved me when we were traveling to a friends house and a hotel. it cot fit perfectly in my large suitcase. now we keep it at my sisters as an extra napping place. I love that it came with a cot sheet. my son leaked out of his diaper one night and i was worried abt the clean up. it was super easy. and I love how the bottom of cot (under the cot) was lined with waterproof material. the only reason why I gave traveling 4 out of 5 stars is because I wish the bag that you carry the cot in had a handle on it for easier carrying.
customer_reviews.author: JOnes

customer_reviews.title: Nice for traveling
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 3 and struggling to sleep in her own room. She loves this for naps. We are working to get her in her own room. I think this would be great for traveling. I did have to put down it’s after blanket along with some thing to cover her up. Because the material is not exactly comfortable. And it doesn’t fit a regular size pillow well. But that wasn’t an issue! We were overall pleased with the product and think it will help us
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two cots. One came fully assembled and ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two cots. One came fully assembled and the other was not. The unassembled cot was missing two fabric pins and two screws. It has a large dirty mark on it which made us wonder if this cot was used prior. One leg does not touch the ground when it's unfolded causing it to be very unstable. The fitted sheets that were advertised as part of this package were not there for either cot. :(
customer_reviews.author: Max C.

customer_reviews.title: Great cot and reasonably priced. Buy It!!!! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for!!!!!!! Easy to unfold and fold!!!!! It came with a blue sheet, no assembly required!!!!!! Can use indoors and outdoors😀😀😀😀😀 My grandson loves to sleep on it, especially when we travel to visit relatives. When my grandson have an accident, I put a little bleach in a spray bottle with water to clean it up and throw the sheet in the laundry. When dried I place it into the blue storage bag which came with the cot. I also fold the clean sheet and place it into the bag with the cot. It doesn't take up much as pace ok m the closet not trunk of the car❤️💚💙🧡💛
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Downgraded product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for kids for camping. Bought two of them at separate times. First came with a storage bag second did not. Company said they don’t provide them anymore. Who sells foldable camping / travel gear without storage bag??? Company has done themselves and their customers an injustice with this decision. You should also improve a product not worsen its value and effectiveness. Not a fan!
customer_reviews.author: Barnett H.

customer_reviews.title: Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cot and it worked out great for my grandson. He slept well on it. It was easy to set up and easy to put away. It's good for a child 1 and a half to 3 years old.
customer_reviews.author: The Daffern's

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, comfy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Got this for our 2.5 year old for camp. Daughter was so excited to use it and is everytime. Came with a little sleeping bag with a small built in pillow. It sets up and folds up easy. No issues with discomfort or falling out. Nice and low to the ground too. I just wish it came with a bag to put the cot in or some kind of built in locking clamps when folded up to make for easier transportation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little "bed" for visiting granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3 year old granddaughter had out grown her portable crib used for spending nights at my house. Glad I found this little cot. It's affordable and easy to setup. I put a twin side comforter, folded in thirds, on top of it for some cushion and comfort. She loves it! The instructions say no standing on it, so I have to keep reminding her not too. Although, the cot seems stable enough for her weight to not tip over (29 lbs).
customer_reviews.author: TE

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, poor execution.
customer_reviews.text: My husband spent several minutes trying to figure out how to lock it in place even though I told him it didn’t, because he couldn’t believe it had been designed that badly. With the tension going across the top, middle and bottom, it dips in between, and basically has a pronounced bump right across the middle. Of course, if it locked when pushed down and at its tightest, this wouldn’t be as big of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: K.Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Buy this, its awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best $25 I've spent. Thus folds and unfolds in one second. It's easy to throw in the car for vacations when you dont want to rent a baby bed. My daughter sleeps on this fairly often even at home. She is somewhat sensitive to textures, so the sheet is a must as the bed itself doesnt agree with her. The sheet ripped pretty soon after purchase, but a regular crib sheet works pretty well, and is probably a little softer. This could probably even be an awesome,dog bed once she gets too big for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kahl Drogo

customer_reviews.title: Great price, sleep and ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: My three-year-old slept on this for two weeks during vacation with a pillow and cheap kid sleeping bag from Target. He slept great on it, and had no complaints. It’s super easy to fold up. The only feature that’s missing is a strap to hold it all together tight when together. That said, it really wasn’t a big deal at all. It didn’t pop open, and still packed easy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: HDBSNE

customer_reviews.title: Sets up in less than 10secs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister to use to transition her granddaughter, my great-niece from her pac-n-play to a bed. It was the best gift I’ve given to her so far. We take it every where we go, and we’re traveling at lest 3x a month. When she’s not traveling, she’s at home using it for nap time. When Kat is tired, she knows how to get her cot and place it where it belongs, and my sister will set it up for her. It folds and unfolds in less than 10secs. Kat will get her pillow & blanky....and she’s ready for her nap. It’s Easy to clean, sturdy, Kat loves it. I can’t say enough about it.
customer_reviews.author: Atilah Claiborne

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfy, my kids loved them so much that they were using them to sleep in the living room to play video games or late nights watching movies on the weekends, I guess is better if you use this product only when you are on a trip, it can broke after using them constantly for several months, I’m giving 4 stars because my daughters were not very careful so I guess it’s not the products fault.
customer_reviews.author: Amairani Hernadez

customer_reviews.title: No travel bag, inconvenient for travel
customer_reviews.text: Terrible customer service by Regalo. The item no longer comes with a travel bag. Even though the manual says it has a bag. No bag is available for purchase separately. It’s an awkward size so doesn’t fit into a normal shopping bag. And doesn’t stay folded all the way. So, inconvenient for traveling or tidy storage as offered. I called Regalo to see if they could give me dimensions of travel bag that used to come with, and they said they don’t have that info. It seems odd to me that a manufacturer wouldn’t retain specs of products.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M

customer_reviews.title: Solved Nap
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! She started having s hard time sleeping at daycare which resulted in her being very cranky. We decided to get her a cot & new blanket. It has made a world of a difference. She loves it. We have another one for traveling. I’m giving it 4 stars vs 4 because the company does not offer extra sheets to purchase. We wash her sheet every week. It now has a hole in it and I can’t find more sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Great cot
customer_reviews.text: We reviewed air matresses for our toddler. 15.00 seemed too cheap, but 60.00 or more seemed steep knowing it will take a beating and might not last long. Then i came across the reviews for this. Affordable, won't pop/leak, fits in carry on luggage. We got one to take on the plane, but in the meantime used it for an overnight in a hotel bc i didnt feel comfortable with out toddler sleeping in the hotel room bed without rails. This thing was a hit! She was excited and stayed in it all night long :)
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for overnight trips.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up for my 5 year old for camping. She's tall for her age and reached end to end, head to toe. It was still comfortable for her, got a great night sleep the whole night through. It folds up so easily that my 5 year old could set it up and put it away on her own. This is perfect for travel, overnight trips, it's compact, no bigger than a fold up camping chair. The price is great and it'll be passed down to my 2 yro when my daughter outgrows it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Andes

customer_reviews.title: When they are to old for the pack and play...
customer_reviews.text: After we transitioned my toddler from the crib to a bed hotel travel became hard because he wanted to be in a bed but we were nervous he would fall out so preferred the cribs. This cot was the perfect solution to the problem. They are in a "big kid" bed while still being close enough to the ground that you don't worry about them falling out. It also has a zip up sleeping bag which keeps my little guy snug. Folds up easily and is very compact to throw in the car. I can't comment on comfort but he loves it and sleeps amazing in it.
customer_reviews.author: laurelgem

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered this, I received it with a 4-5inch torn seam. I was very disappointed. However, after contacting customer service, I was rushed a replacement and I received it fairly quickly. I was afraid I wasn't going to receive it on time as my family will be going out of town soon for work related which is the whole purpose of why we purchase this, was for trips. I would say after inspecting the 2nd one, it is perfect and my son loves laying in it. It is very convenient as well. Customer service is superb.
customer_reviews.author: YX

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my 3 year old who is in daycare and was required to have a "mat" or something to sleep on. I tried searching for the usual pre k mats (the red and blue ones) like I had back in the 90s when I was a child, but couldn't find any... I came across this product and figured this would be more comfortable... My child loves this product, and sleeps very well on it...it comes with a fitted sheet and the set up is easy. Easy to fold and store
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Best priced for my pit bull!
customer_reviews.text: So we are in our camper frequently on weekends. My pit bull always climbs on my lap cuz she doesn’t want to lie on the ground. I looked for foldable/outdoor dog beds but this was cheaper and bigger. It is hysterical that all my friend’s dogs See it and jump right up and lie down. She has room to share with her friends. Put her blank or on it and she is in heaven. Cleans easily from camping dog grit and stores small in our camper “basement” with our outdoor chairs. Some weeks I leave it with friends for their dogs to enjoy. Spoiled puppies!
customer_reviews.author: Goddess Valeria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel cot!
customer_reviews.text: We were trying to figure out where to have our 3 y.o. sleep while traveling over seas. He just transferred to his toddler bed so a crib wouldn’t work anymore, but he is definitely not ready for a regular bed. This cot was the perfect solution! It is light and compact, so easy to pack, and he was so excited to have his own bed! We even gave him the option of a nice blow up twin mattress at one location and he wasn’t interested. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Mathias

customer_reviews.title: The perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two year old for his first sleepover at grandmas house. It is the perfect size; not super comfy but it's a cot so I wasn't expecting a temperpedic. My son doesn't really care for it but that could easily just be because he's in a not liking anything stage. It's nice that it comes with a sheet that can be washed I just really wish it had a carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh V.

customer_reviews.title: Love these cots
customer_reviews.text: This purchase makes a total of five of these cots that I now own. They are just right for my daycare toddlers. I am currently using them for ages 16 months to 4 yrs. All the kids love their "beds" and it has enough sag to keep them from rolling off while still supporting them. The sheets that come with them fit great and we only take those off to wash. Easy up and down. My 3 and 4 yr olds put theirs down and away on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Tucker

customer_reviews.title: My petite four year old loved it. However
customer_reviews.text: It only lasted one month. My petite four year old loved it. However, the construction was VERY POOR. The "bolts" came out of two spots, causing the frame to bend and the plastic supports to break. I would not recommend this product. It was returned promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Curlygirl

customer_reviews.title: No travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Cot no longer comes with a travel bag even thought he box stated it came with one and the product video states it as well. how do you sell something for travel that doesn't come with a way to store it or to keep from unfolding. will be looking for another solution
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and then bought another. Just so convenient for travelling. I actually purchased it for my beagle. I was looking for a foldable dog cot for travelling and wasn't able to find onr. But now, because the two dogs and two cats love it so much. I have one inside and the other outside. Large is big enough for two beagles. I like the fitted sheet. When it gets hairy, just wash it. NO big deal. I may purchase another for my visits from my nephew
customer_reviews.author: adkdreamer

customer_reviews.title: nice little travel bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old. He will not stay in the Pack'n'Play anymore so was hoping he would stay in a "real bed" when we travel. He does and it seems comfortable, at least enough for a couple of nights. This is easy to fold and get into the bag. I do wish the bag had a handle. My biggest issue with this bed is that the provided "sheet" doesn't fit - it's too small so if I use it, it prevents the bed from fully extending. I've not had to clean the canvas of the bed yet so cannot comment on ease of cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Portable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I was absolutely surprised at how small this cot folds up. It folds like a camping chair and comes with a sheet, of sub par quality. I put a different sheet on it and laid a blanket underneath for more comfort. My toddler is 3 and slept like a baby. She sleeps well anyways but it's always different sleeping habits when traveling. This was her bed and she knew it. Itll be a wonderful addition to our future travel needs.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Wogan

customer_reviews.title: Great portable cot!
customer_reviews.text: We love how portable this is! If you are looking for a child sized cot, look no further. This folds up just like the folding chairs we use at the beach and camp and is made of similar, albeit sturdier material. The sheet that comes with it is nothing special, but we use it with a waterproof bed protector underneath for accidents. It's very durable, my toddler even jumps on this cot. It's not a luxurious plush bed, but it is perfect for on the go! For everyday use I would suggest some padding under the sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Little Cot!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 3 y/o to use when we had company and now use it for slumber parties and when we vacation. Pros: -sit it in on the ground (smooth surfaces) and it slides right open. Easiest setup you could ask for! -great price -lightweight -comes with thin sheet -easy to fold up -fits into travel/storage bag easily Cons: -the sleep surface fabric isn’t washable. I spot clean as needed and put a thicker cloth on top before she lays on it. Overall, I really like the product and definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved them, wish they came with a carry bag
customer_reviews.text: I got 1 for my almost 3 yr old and 1 for my 5.5yr old and they both loved them! They slept great and said they were really comfortable. I was a little worried because of the way the material is pulled, it sort of creates a hump in the middle and pushes their backs up, but once their heads are on their pillow then they are fine. My one and only complaint is that they don't come with a carry bag or any type of strap to keep them folded while carrying them. It'd be super helpful to have something to keep them closed more easily.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: No carry case :/
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 other Regalo cots that I love and needed a 3rd. Well... I opened this one up and it only came with the cot and a sheet... no “convient carrying case “ like it stated in the box. So my two star review is not specifically for the cot itself but bc the contents did not match the description. I contacted Regalo and they would not do anything for me....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Just received this but seems very well made and durable, high quality canvas and legs/supports seem very good. Would recommend getting a foam pad or something though for the top of will be pretty hard for Junior. Definitely great for naps while on trips, camping, at friends house, etc. and will very easily fit in your trunk. Easy fold up and goes easily back into the back. I've found all Regalo products to be durable and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: DLee

customer_reviews.title: Why not?
customer_reviews.text: For $25 this is a no-brainer. Unfold, attach sheet cover that it comes with then unroll a kids sleeping bag and pillow. We used this for a family vacation and my son was super proud of his nifty little fold up bed. May not be the most comfortable but with a nice sleeping bag, most kids won’t mind. Great product. Handy and practical. Just get it, you have nothing to lose.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: No carrying case
customer_reviews.text: Emailed regarding no bag came with the cot. Well... you could have said let’s see if we could find you one. Next time advertise no bag comes with product. Never again
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter (5) who broke her leg so she could have somewhere to hang out other than the couch in the living room. Absolute life saver. With all the company coming to visit her, it was the perfect place to be so there was still seating for her guests. Made her feel special to have her own little spot. Was surprised a little by how low to the ground it is, but worked out perfect for us because I didn’t have to worry about her falling off and getting more hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Crista Dinuis

product_meta.title: Regalo My Cot Portable Toddler Bed, Includes Fitted Sheet, Royal Blue
product_meta.description:
Color:Royal BlueMy Cot child size portable sleeping cot is super for sleepovers, camping and daycare. The durable all steel constructed frame has a reinforced canvas bed liner and washable matching sheet. This is the perfect cot for sleepovers, outings, traveling, camping, day care or lounging around the house. It is incredibly quick and easy to set up and fold down. It folds down to a fraction of its set up size for complete portability. The lightweight design comes in a sturdy, all steel frame construction.

BRAND STORY
By Regalo

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
My Cot child size portable sleeping cot is super for sleepovers, camping and daycare. The durable all steel constructed frame has a reinforced canvas bed liner and washable matching sheet. This is the perfect cot for sleepovers, outings, traveling, camping, day care or lounging around the house. It is incredibly quick and easy to set up and fold down. It folds down to a fraction of its set up size for complete portability. The lightweight design comes in a sturdy, all steel frame construction.

See more
feature_bullets: CONVENIENT: No set up required! This cot’s simple fold and go system is quick and easy to use.
DURABLE: Made with an all steel frame that is light-weight and will hold up to 75 pounds.
COMFORT: This cot has a large 48”L x 24”W x 9”H sleep surface with full canvas sleeping area and includes a fitted sheet for added comfort.
TRAVEL: Light weight for travel. This cot folds down to 9”L x 8”W x 24”H.
FOR USE: Great for naptime, sleep-overs, vacations, pre-school, playtime…etc

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars12,911 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
